Package org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.repositoryservices.postgres.repositoryconnector.mappers

Class RepositoryMapper

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.resource.jdbc.mappers.BaseMapper
org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.repositoryservices.postgres.repositoryconnector.mappers.RepositoryMapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassificationMapper, EntityMapper, RelationshipMapper
public class RepositoryMapper extends BaseMapper
Common routines used by the mappers

      protected void fillInstanceAuditHeader(InstanceAuditHeader instanceAuditHeader, Map<String,JDBCDataValue> instanceTableRow) throws RepositoryErrorException
      Fill in an instance audit header from the values retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      instanceAuditHeader - header to fill in
      instanceTableRow - values from the database
      Throws:
      RepositoryErrorException - mapping problem or missing values

    • getInstanceProperties

      protected InstanceProperties getInstanceProperties(Map<String,JDBCDataValue> instanceTableRow, List<Map<String,JDBCDataValue>> instancePropertiesTableRows) throws RepositoryErrorException
      Convert the tables retrieved from the database into an instance properties object. It may contain effectivity dates and/or attributes.
      Parameters:
      instanceTableRow - row from the entity, relationship/classification
      instancePropertiesTableRows - rows for each version of each attribute
      Returns:
      instance properties object or null
      Throws:
      RepositoryErrorException - there was a mapping problem

    • getUniqueProperties

      protected InstanceProperties getUniqueProperties(Map<String,JDBCDataValue> instanceTableRow, List<Map<String,JDBCDataValue>> instancePropertiesTableRows) throws RepositoryErrorException
      Convert the tables retrieved from the database into an instance properties object. It may contain effectivity dates and/or unique attributes.
      Parameters:
      instanceTableRow - row from the entity, relationship/classification
      instancePropertiesTableRows - rows for each version of each attribute
      Returns:
      instance properties object or null
      Throws:
      RepositoryErrorException - there was a mapping problem

    • extractValuesFromInstanceAuditHeader

      protected void extractValuesFromInstanceAuditHeader(Map<String,JDBCDataValue> instanceTableRow, String instanceGUID, String classificationName, Date effectiveFromTime, Date effectiveToTime, Date versionEndTime, InstanceAuditHeader instanceAuditHeader) throws RepositoryErrorException
      Add the values from the header into a table row.
      Parameters:
      instanceTableRow - row
      instanceGUID - unique identifier of instance
      classificationName - optional classification name
      effectiveFromTime - effective from (optional)
      effectiveToTime - effective to (optional)
      versionEndTime - time that this version ended (null for the latest version)
      instanceAuditHeader - header info
      Throws:
      RepositoryErrorException - there was a mapping problem

    • extractValuesFromInstanceHeader

      protected void extractValuesFromInstanceHeader(Map<String,JDBCDataValue> instanceTableRow, String classificationName, Date effectiveFromTime, Date effectiveToTime, Date versionEndTime, InstanceHeader instanceHeader) throws RepositoryErrorException
      Add the values from the header into a table row.
      Parameters:
      instanceTableRow - row
      classificationName - optional classification name
      effectiveFromTime - effective from (optional)
      effectiveToTime - effective to (optional)
      versionEndTime - time that this version ended (null for the latest version)
      instanceHeader - header info
      Throws:
      RepositoryErrorException - there was a mapping problem
